009package Tools_;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
013import imagingbook.core.FileUtils;
014import imagingbook.core.Info;
015
016
017/**
018 * A simple ImageJ plugin for validating the 'imagingbook' installation.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 */
022public class Check_Installation implements PlugIn {
023
024        @Override
025        public void run(String arg0) {
026                IJ.log("Executing plugin ...... " + this.getClass().getName());
027                IJ.log("Operating system ...... " + System.getProperty("os.name") + " / " +
028                                System.getProperty("sun.arch.data.model") + " bits");
029                IJ.log("Java version .......... " + System.getProperty("java.version"));
030                IJ.log("Java runtime .......... " + System.getProperty("java.runtime.version"));
031                IJ.log("Java VM ............... " + System.getProperty("java.vm.version"));
032                IJ.log("ImageJ version ........ " + IJ.getFullVersion());
033                
034                try {
035                        IJ.log("imagingbook location .. " + FileUtils.getClassPath(Info.class));
036                        IJ.log("imagingbook version ... " + Info.getVersionInfo());
037                        IJ.log("imagingbook installation seems to be running OK.");
038                } catch (Exception e) {
039                        IJ.log("imagingbook libary not found:");
040                        IJ.log("make sure 'imagingbook-common.jar' is placed in the ImageJ/plugins or ImageJ/jars folder!");
041                }
042        }
043
044}
